title: Carrying the Spaniard's Child
description:
There can be no resistance...only surrender!

 
Waitress Belle Langtry's night of no regrets with ruthless playboy Santiago Velazquez was never meant to be more than a sinfully sweet memory. Until fate has other plans, and Belle finds herself carrying the baby she never thought possible!Santiago has long rejected all notions of fatherhood, so Belle's news is shocking. He might refuse to trust her, but Santiago won't let Belle escape his claim--to her or their child! His plan? To bind Belle with his ring, and keep her in thrall to him with his touch!
author: Jennie Lucas
